text: Mirage is a 1965 American mystery thriller movie directed by Edward Dmytryk and based on the 1952 novel Fallen Angel by Howard Fast. It stars Gregory Peck, Diane Baker, Walter Matthau, Kevin McCarthy, Jack Weston, Leif Erickson, Walter Abel, George Kennedy, Hari Rhodes and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1960s mystery movies Category:1965 thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Edward Dmytryk Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Mirage (movie)
